creator: TapSol Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Scary Grandpa Hunter 3D Escape is a horror game bringing you a long-anticipated opportunity to play for a scary grandpa. Start your creepy adventures and strike fear into your victims using every possible means. Go old for a while to play insane tricks on everyone around and have real fun in Scary Grandpa Hunter 3D Escape!

The grandpa and granny are two ruthless hunters whose favorite preys are desperate tourists who got lost in the forest at night. Every strange neighbor in the neighborhood knows that both old stranger hunter and horror are flat-out schizoids who can turn anyone’s life into an unending nightmare.

Your mission in this scary game is pretty simple. You need to find as many victims as possible during the night, load them into your car trunk, and take them to the old mansion for further entertainment. Be careful while searching for your prey in the scary granny & grandpa hunter house escape game, because it is a stranger horror evil nun game with hide-and-seek elements. And be very quiet, too, because your suspicious evil nun neighbors can always call the police, but going to prison is outside the plans of a crazy evil grandpa and a scary granny hunter.

The Scary Grandpa Hunter 3D Escape game offers you an option to choose a character to play for in theorpo Grandpa Hunter 3D Escape game: a grandpa or a granny. Additional different types of skills vary based on the type of character you select. That way, a spooky evil granny is very quiet and more experienced in finding escapists while a mad grandpa is smarter and faster than the granny, and he also has a powerful weapon, namely, a huge hammer like this used in the evil nun horror hunter game. A horror house escape for victims is very dangerous, and their chances for survival in the house of mentally-ill olds are minimal either. So victims will try to hide at every opportunity, and your task is to discover them before they escape your mansion in the Scary Grandpa Hunter 3D Escape.

Make sure you visit the scary granny & grandpa's house. Though it is closed at night, nothing prevents you from breaking in using brute physical force as old people stranger grandpa are not very good at solving puzzles. Grandpa knows how to handle his hammer. He can smash and destroy absolutely anything using this tool, and he even does not need a gun evil grandpa kills you without using a gun! Granny & Grandpa's horror stranger is equipped with a solid bat which she uses to punish her naughty grandsons. scary evil Old strangers folks also love to set traps, which makes the hunting process very easy for the grandpa and his granny and utmost terrifying for the victims in Scary Grandpa Hunter 3D Escape.

This Scary Grandpa Hunter 3D Escape Horror game is full of unpredictable turns of events and mind-blowing puzzles. What sets the Grandpa And Scary Grandpa Hunter 3D Escape game apart from other scary granny & grandpa hunter house games is that horror house games here do not stand behind when the player’s back, but it is the players themselves who create the atmosphere of creepiness and fear in Scary Grandpa Hunter 3D Escape. This horror game is free and supports several difficult game modes including “Ghost Mode”. Now every player can try on the role of the very insane scary evil grandpa or the merciless granny and find out how it feels to be an old crackpot in Scary Grandpa Hunter 3D Escape.

Stranger Neighbors, turn the lights off Kids, run away like hell! The Scary Grandpa Hunter 3D Escape game starts!
descriptionShort: If you can escape from this hunter horror house without caught by grandpa!
